title: v1.6.3.4 Documentation Update
details:
Updated all Copilot instructions and agent files from v1.6.3.3 to v1.6.3.4.

Key v1.6.3.4 features documented:
- State Hydration on Page Reload: _initStep6_Hydrate() restores Quick Tabs from storage
- Source Tracking in Logs: All actions log source ('Manager', 'UI', 'hydration', 'automation')
- Z-Index Persistence: handleFocus() persists z-index to storage immediately
- Unified Destroy Path: UI close button uses DestroyHandler for consistent cleanup

Files updated (all under 15KB):
- .github/copilot-instructions.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-unified-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-cross-tab-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-single-tab-agent.md
- .github/agents/quicktabs-manager-agent.md
- .github/agents/bug-fixer.md
- .github/agents/bug-architect.md
- .github/agents/feature-builder.md
- .github/agents/feature-optimizer.md
- .github/agents/copilot-docs-updater.md

Source values corrected to match actual codebase: 'Manager', 'UI', 'hydration', 'automation' (removed 'background' which was not actually used)
